price: Mbega none igihe cose abayahudi batanze isezerano bakwiye kwubahiriza, muri bo hazokwama havamwo umugwi wihindukize kuri ryo, urihonyange! Ahubwo rero abenshi muri bo ntibemera ivyo Imana Allah Yahishuriye Intumwa yayo Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah).
arabic: أَوَكُلَّمَا عَٰهَدُواْ عَهۡدٗا نَّبَذَهُۥ فَرِيقٞ مِّنۡهُمۚ بَلۡ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

meta.transliteration: awakullamā ʿāhadū ʿahdan nabadhahu farīqun min'hum bal aktharuhum lā yu'minūna
